<style>
  body {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    font-family: "Segoe UI", system-ui, sans-serif;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fdfbfb 0%, #ebedee 100%);
    color: #333;
  }

  .hub {
    max-width: 520px;
    margin: 5rem auto;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0 1rem;
  }

  /* 头像 */
  .hub img.avatar {
    width: 120px;
    height: 120px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    border: 3px solid #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  }

  .hub h1 {
    font-size: 2rem;
    margin: 0.5rem 0;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff6cab, #7366ff);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  }

  .hub p.tagline {
    color: #666;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    font-size: 1.05rem;
  }

  /* Daily Note 区块 */
  .note {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 1.2rem 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 14px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
    text-align: left;
    border-left: 4px solid #7366ff;
    animation: fadeIn 1.2s ease-out;
  }
  .note h2 {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    margin: 0 0 0.6rem;
    color: #555;
  }
  .note p {
    margin: 0.4rem 0;
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    color: #444;
  }
  .note small {
    display: block;
    margin-top: .8rem;
    color: #888;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    text-align: right;
  }

  @keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(12px); }
    to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
  }

  /* 链接按钮容器 */
  .links {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
  }

  /* 按钮 */
  .link-btn {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: .6rem;
    padding: 1rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    border-radius: 14px;
    color: white;
    transition: transform .2s ease, box-shadow .25s ease;
    animation: pulse 3s infinite ease-in-out;
  }
  .link-btn:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.03);
    box-shadow: 0 6px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
  }

  .instagram { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #fd1d1d, #e1306c, #f77737); }
  .ebay { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #0064D2, #0a84ff); }
  .whatsapp { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #25D366, #128c7e); }
  .youtube { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff0000, #cc0000); }
  .photos { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #fbbf24, #f59e0b); color: #111; }
  .blog { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #9333ea, #7e22ce); }

  /* 呼吸动画 */
  @keyframes pulse {
    0%,100% { transform: scale(1); }
    50% { transform: scale(1.02); }
  }
</style>

<div class="hub">

    <a href="https://youtube.com/" target="_blank" class="link-btn youtube">🎥 YouTube / Playlist</a>
    <a href="https://photos.google.com/" target="_blank" class="link-btn photos">🌄 Photo Album</a>
